response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and unique features, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its intrinsic worth and market demand, we propose a price of $950,000 for this remarkable item. We are confident that this offer strikes a balance between fair market valuation and our desire to maximize the product's value. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
